text:
When you double click on the System Tray Apache Monitor, it opens up and you 
can restart the server no problems, but if you single "left" click on the icon 
in the system tray and then highlight the server and then "restart".  The 
Monitor program crashes and causes a "send Microsoft an error report" and then 
closes out of the system tray.  The server is not restarted at all.

Not a big bug.. and probably just XP specific (that's what I get for trying it 
on something it may not have been intended for ;)

Great work on 2.0 ~!  Love it~!

- Michael
creator: michael@therightdj.com

text: *** Bug 8147 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: jwoolley@apache.org

text: Patch applied, for the next release (.36).  Thanks David!
creator: wrowe@apache.org
